creditline: The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books
description: two parts bound in one volume; illustrated with 56 engraved plates on blue paper; oblong folio; bound in contemporary German three-quarter brown calf over marbled boards; red morocco spine label stamped in gilt; text on white paper followed by engravings on blue paper of letters and alphabets, quotes, heraldic, geometric, emblematic and alchemical imagery, portraiture, natural history scenes, astronomical calendars and charts
marks:
Inscription and Marks

on first page, in pencil:
title: Liber artificiosus alphabeti maioris, oder: neu inventirtes Kunst- Schreib- und Zeichenbuch
